experience.title: Master of Informatics
experience.highlight: Recognized digits using convolutional neural networks built with numpy.
Detected and tracked single object in 3D and multiple objects in 2D.
Parallelized algorithm and implemented leader election with message passing.
Designed relational schema, parsed XML and combined SQL with full text search.
Discovered, exploited and patched contrived vulnerabilities in binary and web app.
Used map reduce to clean text data, count bigrams and join tables.

experience.title: International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme
experience.highlight: Final grade 37/45 among the top 15% worldwide (545+ UCAS points).

Four subjects at higher level, including
English B
Physics
Mathematics
Economics

experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.highlight: Built stereo vision system with open source libraries.
Devised experiments, created data sets and analysed results.
Evaluated applicability of new technology to present and future products.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.highlight: Worked in agile team, learning from more experienced developers and mentoring less experienced colleagues.
Dealt with unfamiliar technologies and proprietary systems.
